description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Physics based ball bouncing game.  At first glance this seems easy but add a second paddle or a second player and things become a lot more interesting.  Multi player Vs mode is a truly unique experience.
description.short: Physics based ball bouncing game.  At first glance this seems easy but add a second paddle or a second player and things become a lot more interesting.  Multi player Vs mode is a truly unique experience.
